duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement and manage digital analytics tools to track performance across various online platforms.
Analyze large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities, providing actionable insights and recommendations.
Generate regular and ad hoc reports detailing key digital metrics, KPIs, and campaign performance, developing visualizations and dashboards to communicate insights.
Utilize user behavior data to understand customer journeys, preferences, and pain points, identifying opportunities to enhance user experience and increase engagement.
Research and monitor digital trends, industry best practices, and competitor activities, providing insights on potential strategies to gain a competitive edge.
Manage and maintain tags for tracking purposes, ensuring accurate data collection across all digital properties.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Statistics, Data Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
